hero.description: We are an organization of developers passionate about technology and open source. We create innovative projects with a touch of humor and creativity.

team.title: Our Team
team.description: Meet the members who make DuckHats possible, a combination of talent and passion for development.

projects.title: Our Projects
projects.description: Discover some of our featured projects we're working on.
projects.eduQuackDesc: An educational platform to facilitate communication between teachers and students.
projects.duckHuntDesc: A modern version of the classic Duck Hunt game with new features.
projects.duckDocsDesc: Documentation system for open source projects.

technologies.title: Technologies
technologies.description: The tools and technologies we use to create our projects.

footer.tagline: Developing with passion and a touch of humor.
